text:
@toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock Same old same old.

1. When NHS going well, praise nurses doctors hospital admin who didn't order enough PPE.
2. When it's not slag off government off as a load of useless morons.
3. When a Gov official smiles slag them off.
4. When nurses/doctors dance & sing on wards clap them.
